intro: Myosotis intermedia, commonly known as the hybrid forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the Primulaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, blue to purple flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shady environments such as woodlands and stream sides. It has oval, hairy leaves that are arranged alternately along the stem. Myosotis intermedia is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a wildflower in naturalized areas.
